channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: President of $200 billion Shopify says some of the greatest workers he knows only clock in 40-hour weeks: ‘You don’t have to work 80 hours’
item.description: AI is reshaping work and productivity, but you don’t have to work crazy overtime to succeed, Shopify’s Harley Finkelstein says.

item.title: Australia Bans Teens From Social Media – Will Other Countries Follow?
item.description: Under-16s in Australia will no longer be able to access X, TikTok and other social networks. Will other countries now seek to impose similar bans?

item.title: A divided Fed meets today and Wall Street is listening for 4 key words from Powell: ‘In a good place’
item.description: If he does not use that phrase, he may be open to further interest rate cuts.

item.title: Key questions to stay grounded in the AI frenzy
item.description: With startup valuations soaring, VCs at Fortune's Brainstorm AI shared their thoughts on how to navigate these bubbly times.

item.title: 2026 will be the year CEOs must prove AI is powering growth—not just cost cutting and layoffs
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Nocs Introduces New Active Stereo Speakers Inspired By Cubist Artist Georges Braque
item.description: Featuring a steel base made in Sweden and wooden cabinet made in Estonia, the Nocs Braque is a Baltic-inspired active speaker system that pays homage ...

item.title: FBI Warns All Smartphone Users—Stop Making These Calls
item.description: These phone numbers are dangerous — here's why.

item.title: 2024’s Funniest Indie Finally Hits Xbox And Game Pass
item.description: Coal Supper's magnum opus, and arguably the funniest game of the last decade, has finally landed on Xbox, and it's a Game Pass day-oner.

item.title: When David Ellison was 13, his billionaire father Larry bought him a plane. He competed in airshows before leaving it to become a Hollywood executive
item.description: Ellison, 42, revived "Top Gun"—and now he’s taking the fight to Netflix.

item.title: If This Google Play Store App Is On Your Phone, Delete It Now
item.description: This app is dangerous — check your phone now.

item.title: Mortgage rates are surging ahead of the Fed’s expected rate cut. What gives?
Home delistings surge as sellers struggle to get their price
item.description: Home sellers pull listings at record rates in 2025 as housing market stagnates nationwide. Delistings are up 45% with buyers and sellers far apart on ...

item.title: Bessent says US 'going to finish the year' with 3% GDP growth despite government shutdown
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent predicts the U.S. will finish 2025 with 3% GDP growth despite economic volatility from tariffs and immigration policy...

item.title: Fed expected to deliver third straight rate cut this week amid labor concerns
item.description: Fed policymakers face a tough decision on rates with inflation remaining above target as weak job market data and rising layoffs complicate the outloo...

item.title: Why Trump’s new $12B farm aid package is just a Band-Aid for struggling growers
Nvidia’s stock rises as Trump blesses China sales. It's a big opportunity.
Treasury yields rise as Fed's rate-cutting cycle may leave many disappointed
Stocks close lower, Treasury yields rise as Fed’s interest-rate decision nears
Fed's favored inflation gauge shows consumer prices remained elevated in September
item.description: The Commerce Department's delayed September PCE inflation report showed that inflation remained well above the Federal Reserve's 2% target ahead of a ...

item.title: US layoffs soar past 1.1M in 2025, highest level since the pandemic
item.description: November layoffs dropped 53% from last month but rose 24% yearly, pushing 2025 job cuts to levels not seen since COVID-19 pandemic struck the American...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
